name: Dancing Chair (itch)
description:
It's first game I made.

Two men struggle to get the chair!!!

【RULE】

After stopping the music,

If you can sit the chair at a certain time , YOU WIN !

【OPERATION】

1P
Walkㅤㅤ:ㅤWㅤㅤAttack1ㅤ:ㅤE
Turn（L）:ㅤAㅤㅤAttack2ㅤ:ㅤR
Turn（R）:ㅤDㅤㅤAttack3ㅤ:ㅤT
Sitㅤㅤㅤㅤ:ㅤSㅤㅤJumpㅤㅤ:ㅤSpace

2P
Walkㅤㅤ:ㅤ↑ㅤㅤAttack1ㅤㅤ:ㅤI
Turn（L）:ㅤ←ㅤㅤAttack2ㅤㅤ:ㅤO
Turn（R）:ㅤ→ㅤㅤAttack3ㅤㅤ:ㅤP
Sitㅤㅤㅤㅤ:ㅤ↓ㅤㅤJumpㅤㅤㅤ:ㅤCtrl(R)
Restartㅤ:ㅤEnter

※You can see them in [Show Config] in the game.

【SETTING】

・You can choose [1P VS CPU] mode or [1P VS 2P] mode.
・You can choose the time to sit.
